page.title: 13Boreland Farm
page.content: Mr Neil has been farming for 50 years. He has 1,000 acres. There are 7 fields of waste ground. He mainly makes silage. He has a lot of farm buildings and a big farm house. He has built a big dairy shed for 150 cows. He has 230 dairy cows which are fed on silage in winter. They are milked twice a day at 4.30 am and 3.30 pm. He has increased the sheep from 250 to 600. He feeds them on rough sheep mixture in winter. There are 7 people working on the farm. They work from 6.00 am to 6.00 pm. He thinks the farm could be far more computerised in years to come.
